extendedInfo.description: With over 1,000 icons in 176 different styles/colors, you can break the monotony of traditional themes and icon packs.  For the price of a latte, you can theme all your Android devices exactly how you want them for the rest of your life.Visit me on Google+ to talk about Droidicon: http://gplus.to/DroidiconIn the early days of LauncherPro, there were only a handful of dock icons included in that beautiful and unique LP style we have come to know and love.  To find more icons in that style, you had to search the web and read through 50 page forum posts.  Then you had to download them to your sd card and apply them from there.  The same was true of dock backgrounds.Then, in June 2010, I brought something new to the LauncherPro icon and dock game.  I built launcherproicons.com where artists could upload their icons and docks, and people could easily find them and download them as well as make requests for new icons.  This still had the problem of downloading to the sd card first, then finding them and applying them.  I fixed that problem by developing the Droidicon app.  This app bypasses all the mess of searching for icons on the web, and groups over 1,000 icons and 400 docks into  one app.  When you go to choose a new custom icon, you simply open Droidicon, and start typing the name of the app you are trying to find. The giant list of icons will be filtered down, and you can quickly choose the icon you need.  You can also search through the docks.I decided to take it one step further and add over 170 different styles of icons.  Each icon is available in each style in a broad range of colors.  You can switch styles at any time, and even build sleek home screens that use multiple icon styles for some really beautiful effects.  With this addition, Droidicon transcended LauncherPro, and became valuable to users of ADW Launcher, GO Launcher and the rest of the home screen replacements.If you are looking for a way to escape completely uniform ADW and LauncherPro icon packs and boring stock home screens to theme your phone exactly how you want it, you absolutely need this app.  It is the ultimate tool for personalization.For a few examples of home screens made with our icons and docks visit http://launcherproicons.com/screenshotsHelp me improve the app by telling me what you would like to see at http://droidicon.uservoice.com/The icons can be used out of the box with the following applications:* ADW and ADW EX* Open Home* GO Launcher EX * LauncherPro and LauncherPro PlusIf you also install Desktop VisualizeR or BetterCut, the icons will work with:* Zeam* HTC SenseUI* Android 2.3 Launcher* Launch-X* Any other launcherThe docks can only be used with launchers that support changing the dock background.Some of the artwork in this app is free to download at http://bit.ly/lpicons.

reviews.title: Driodicon
reviews.comment: Totally Love this application!!! Awesome stuff to make your phone look so cool!! 5 Star\'s all the way! So worth the money!
reviews.author: Leia Watt

reviews.title: Simply The Best.
reviews.comment: Straight-forward, no nonsense, ease of use and a wide range of icons make it the most versatile icon customization app there is in the Market today.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could do with more icons
reviews.comment: Excellent approach, works perfectly. Only tiny complaint: could have more icons or updates. Otherwise definitely worth downloading
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: : c )
reviews.comment: I like this app a lot. It would be even better if you could customize the color..... Meaning how dark or light the icon is. Other than that... Love it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Icon app on the markwt
reviews.comment: If you are into customization  then you NEED this app. Best 3 bucks I have ever spent. Absolutely amazing selection of styles and icons. Great docks too.  Sprint S3 stock.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: This app is a must when it comes to personalising your phone. The choice of designs, shapes, colours, sizes & detail are immense. Superb!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Been my single icon source for years
reviews.comment: I need to have all of my icons themed alike.  there are a lot of really cool icon packs out there, but its extremely rare to find them with enough icons so I can cover everything, this app allows that.
reviews.author: Nick H

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: Does what it says, has most of the docks I \"Google\" for in one place. Keep it up, fellas!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nag, nag, nag!
reviews.comment: Oh well, it\'s definitely a 5 * minimum. Maybe even 10* Well worth the 5 bucks or so.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super! Wide range of icon styles.
reviews.comment: I\'ve had this app now on several different phones running different android os. I picked up the new sprint evo4g lte and it still works great. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good selection
reviews.comment: Great app. Icon menu is a little slow to load, but if you hit the sort button and select \"my apps\" you will save a lot of time. My UI obsession is satisfied.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good!
reviews.comment: Would be great with more accurate icons but tons to choose from. Love it.
reviews.author: Michael Everett

reviews.title: Cool!
reviews.comment: Wish there was more themed icons and whatnot but this App is another great reason why android is so much better than apple. Especially in the customization aspect.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice set and interface
reviews.comment: I really like this app and how easy it is to navigate. I just sometimes wish that there were multicolored sets as well (gmail with red and white).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: Virtually every style and icon you could  want... And the easy to navigate system makes this app indispensible for desired look.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Motorola atrix
reviews.comment: Wish there were a few more icons, but there are a ton to choose from. Am really happy with the basically endless customization. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Handy app, terrible server.
reviews.comment: This is a very good app, but the consistent 500 Server Errors are badly affecting the app, docks and icons aren\'t being downloaded, just infuriating! I really hope the developer can fix the connection issue soon.
reviews.author: Josh Horsley

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: You will find all the icons you need for customization :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Download LauncherPro First!
reviews.comment: These icons and docks are awesome. I wasn\'t able to use them on my phone until I installed LauncherPro. Now my phone looks great! No lag, no crashing. Great icons. Even if there hasn\'t been recent updates, this is still a solid set of icons. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but....
reviews.comment: This hasn\'t been updated in ages to add new icons for widely used apps, such as the Google Play stuff.  I\'d expect it to be updated regularly for this price.
reviews.author: A Google User
